channel.title: CVE Feed for wdm-team -- Mail Queue
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wdm-team -- Mail Queue

item.title: CVE-2023-3167|2024-08-02T06:48:07.586Z -- wdm-team -- mail%20queue
item.description: The Mail Queue plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via an email subject in versions up to, and including, 1.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
